'''Triads''' are a [[flow arts]] prop consisting of three arms radiating from a central hub, manipulated through spins and contact techniques. The three-armed design creates visual patterns distinct from two-armed props.

Triads are supported as a prop type in the [[Vulcan Tech Gospel|VTG]] app.<ref name="vtg-android">{{cite web |url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.firestaff.mcp.VTGv3&hl=en |title=VTG - Flow Arts Resource |publisher=Google Play}}</ref>
